oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Big Ridge State Park promotional postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Foldable color postcard providing information about recreational activities at Big Ridge State Park. One side of postcard has a blank yellow rectangle for correspondence, the message "Greetings from Tennessee / It just comes natural," and a logo for the Tennessee Department of Conservation. On the other side are narratives and four photographs depicting various outdoor activities, such as camping and swimming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Big Ridge State Park (Tenn.); Maynardville (Tenn.); Union County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Tennessee. Division of Parks and Recreation
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: State parks & reserves; Tourism; Recreation
